meanings.sent1: The town slowly recovered in the postcrisis period.
meanings.sent2: The postcrisis response focused on rebuilding homes and businesses.
meanings.sent3: Even the pets seemed relieved in the postcrisis calm.
meanings.sent4: The postcrisis atmosphere was like a fresh start after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The postcrisis landscape was a mix of hope and renewal.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the period following a crisis.
meanings.sent1: The postcrisis support groups helped many people cope.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together seamlessly in the postcrisis phase.
meanings.sent3: The postcrisis meetings were surprisingly uplifting.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship grew stronger in the postcrisis bond.
meanings.sent5: The postcrisis journey was a testament to resilience.
